text: Kévin Pfeffer is a French politician. == Biography == He was born in 1990.. In 2017, he is a candidate in the 7th district of Moselle.. Regional Councillor, he is a candidate in the municipal elections in Stiring-Wendel.. In 2021, Kévin Pfeffer is a candidate for the departmental and regional elections.. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:National Front (France) politicians Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Moselle
title: Kévin Pfeffer
